General.Name: LXRandCo Inc
General.Description: LXRandCo, Inc. operates as an omni-channel retailer of pre-owned luxury handbags and personal accessories. The company offers women's handbags, such as shoulder bags, tote bags, and travel bags, as well as other complementary accessories, including leather goods, jewelry, and silk scarfs through its lxrco.com website, as well as e-commerce platforms of its partners across North America. Its omni-channel model is supported by retail shop-in-shop stores and wholesale activities with retail partners. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 7399 Saint-Laurent Boulevard, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2R 2W5
